title: Hope is not a method. - Rev. ed.
brief_description: Cites and describes seven contraceptive methods with anatomiclaly explicit diagrams. States the advantages and disadvantages of withdrawal, rhythm, spermicidal chemicals, the condom, the diaphragm, the pill, the IUD and sterilization. Suitable for upper secondary level.
